mapper.select: select sp_pp_name_cate.pp_name_number ,sp_pp_name_cate.i_item_number ,sp_industry_item_cate.i_item_name ,sp_pp_name_cate.pp_name_planname from sp_pp_name_cate join sp_industry_item_cate on sp_pp_name_cate.i_item_number = sp_industry_item_cate.i_item_number where sp_pp_name_cate.pp_name_number = #{ppNameNumber}

select sp_pp_name_cate.pp_name_number ,sp_pp_name_cate.i_item_number ,sp_industry_item_cate.i_item_name ,sp_pp_name_cate.pp_name_planname ,sp_pp_name_cate.f_number ,sp_farm.f_name from sp_pp_name_cate join sp_industry_item_cate join sp_farm on sp_pp_name_cate.i_item_number = sp_industry_item_cate.i_item_number and sp_pp_name_cate.f_number = sp_farm.f_number
where
sp_pp_name_cate.pp_name_planname like concat('%',#{property},'%')
sp_industry_item_cate.i_item_name like concat('%',#{property},'%')
sp_farm.f_name like concat('%',#{property},'%')
sp_farm.f_number = #{property}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sp_pp_name_cate (f_number, i_item_number, pp_name_planname) VALUES (#{fNumber}, #{iItemNumber}, #{ppNamePlanname})
